member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.MakeParcelFabricLayer
member.summary: Creates a parcel fabric layer from an input parcel fabric. The parcel fabric layer that is created by the tool is temporary and will not persist after the session ends unless the document is saved. This tool is needed if you want a parcel fabric sublayer to participate in a geoprocessing model.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.MakeParcelFabricLayer.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The parcel fabric dataset that will be used to create the parcel fabric layer. (In, Required)
The output parcel fabric layer. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.MakeParcelFabricLayer.in_parcel_fabric
member.summary: The parcel fabric dataset that will be used to create the parcel fabric layer. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.MakeParcelFabricLayer.parcel_fabric_layer
member.summary: The output parcel fabric layer. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.MakeParcelFabricLayer.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.MakeParcelFabricTableView
member.summary: Creates a table view from an input parcel fabric feature class or table. The table view that is created by the tool is temporary and will not persist after the session ends unless the document is saved. This tool is useful for accessing hidden, nonspatial parcel fabric tables, such as the Plans table and the Accuracy table.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.MakeParcelFabricTableView.#ctor(System.Object,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The parcel fabric dataset that contains the feature class or table that will be used to create a table view. (In, Required)
The parcel fabric feature class or nonspatial table that will be used to create a table view. (In, Required)
The name of the output table view. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.MakeParcelFabricTableView.in_parcel_fabric
member.summary: The parcel fabric dataset that contains the feature class or table that will be used to create a table view. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.MakeParcelFabricTableView.parcel_fabric_table
member.summary: The parcel fabric feature class or nonspatial table that will be used to create a table view. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.MakeParcelFabricTableView.out_view
member.summary: The name of the output table view. (Out, Required)

member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.LoadTopologyToParcelFabric
member.summary: Loads polygon and line features that participate in a topology into a target parcel fabric. The topology requires a predefined set of topology rules:Line—Must be Covered by Boundary Of (polygon)Line—Must Not Self-OverlapLine—Must Not Self-IntersectLine—Must be Single PartLine—Must Not Intersect Or Touch InteriorPolygon—Boundary Must be Covered By (Line)

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.LoadTopologyToParcelFabric.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.
member.param: The target parcel fabric where the data will be loaded. (In, Required)
Input feature class or layer that is part of a topology. The feature class can either be a line or polygon. (In, Required)

param.name: unjoined_group
param.summary: Determines how features will be migrated. (In, Required)

param.name: compute_area
param.summary: Determines how features will be migrated. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.LoadTopologyToParcelFabric.target_parcel_fabric
member.summary: The target parcel fabric where the data will be loaded. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.LoadTopologyToParcelFabric.in_topology_class
member.summary: Input feature class or layer that is part of a topology. The feature class can either be a line or polygon. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.LoadTopologyToParcelFabric.in_point_class
member.summary: Input point feature class or layer. The point feature class does not need to be part of a topology. Only user-defined attributes on the input point feature class will be loaded to corresponding points in the parcel fabric. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.LoadTopologyToParcelFabric.linestring_minimum_segments
member.summary: The minimum number of segments a polyline feature can have before it is loaded as a line string or natural boundary in the parcel fabric. The default is a minimum of 10 segments. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.LoadTopologyToParcelFabric.control_match_tolerance
member.summary: The tolerance in which new parcel fabric points are associated with existing control points in the fabric. The tolerance length units are the same as the length units of the coordinate system of the fabric. If a control match tolerance is not specified, the default of 0.1 meters is used. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.LoadTopologyToParcelFabric.unjoined_group
member.summary: Determines how features will be migrated. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.LoadTopologyToParcelFabric.direction_units
member.summary: The direction units that will be used when generating COGO-bearing attributes for line features during the loading process. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.LoadTopologyToParcelFabric.direction_type
member.summary: The direction type that will be used when generating COGO-bearing attributes for line features during the loading process. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.LoadTopologyToParcelFabric.compute_area
member.summary: Determines how features will be migrated. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.LoadTopologyToParcelFabric.area_units
member.summary: If the Compute Area for New Parcels option is checked, select the area units to be used when computing parcel area during the migration process. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.LoadTopologyToParcelFabric.radial_point_tolerance
member.summary: The tolerance in which new, computed curve center points are matched with existing curve center points found in the fabric. Furthermore, if several computed curve center points lie within this tolerance, they are averaged and merged into a single center point. If a radial tolerance is not specified, the default of 0.5 meters is used. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.LoadTopologyToParcelFabric.accuracy_units
member.summary: The accuracy category of the lines and polygons being migrated. Accuracy categories are defined by date of survey in the parcel fabric. Accuracy category 1 is the highest data accuracy (recently surveyed) and accuracy category 6 is the lowest data accuracy (year 1800 or lower). Accuracy categories are used in the fabric adjustment. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.LoadTopologyToParcelFabric.output_parcel_fabric
member.summary: Output Parcel Fabric (out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.LoadTopologyToParcelFabric.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.LoadTopologyToParcelFabric.ToolboxName
member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.LoadTopologyToParcelFabric.ToolName
member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.LoadTopologyToParcelFabric.Alias
member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.LoadTopologyToParcelFabric.ParameterInfo
member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.AppendParcelFabric
member.summary: Appends one or multiple parcel fabrics into an existing target parcel fabric. The spatial reference of the input parcel fabrics must match the spatial reference of the target parcel fabric.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.AppendParcelFabric.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.

param.name: in_parcels
param.summary: The input parcel fabrics that will be appended into the target parcel fabric. The spatial reference of the input parcel fabric must match that of the target parcel fabric. (In, Required)

param.name: target
param.summary: The existing parcel fabric that the input parcel fabrics will be appended into. The spatial reference of the input parcel fabric must match that of the target parcel fabric. (In, Required)

param.name: unjoined_group
param.summary: Determines how parcels will be appended. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.AppendParcelFabric.in_parcels
member.summary: The input parcel fabrics that will be appended into the target parcel fabric. The spatial reference of the input parcel fabric must match that of the target parcel fabric. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.AppendParcelFabric.target
member.summary: The existing parcel fabric that the input parcel fabrics will be appended into. The spatial reference of the input parcel fabric must match that of the target parcel fabric. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.AppendParcelFabric.unjoined_group
member.summary: Determines how parcels will be appended. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.AppendParcelFabric.parcels_schema_type
member.summary: Specifies if the schema (field definitions) of the input parcel fabric parcels table must match the schema of the target parcel fabric parcels table for data to be appended. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.AppendParcelFabric.field_mapping_parcels
member.summary: Lists the attribute fields that will be mapped to the target parcels table. The list includes the existing attribute fields of the target parcels table and attributes fields that match between the input parcels table and the target parcels table. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.AppendParcelFabric.parcels_subtype
member.summary: A subtype description to assign that subtype to all new parcel features in a parcel fabric that is appended to the target parcel fabric. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.AppendParcelFabric.lines_schema_type
member.summary: Specifies if the schema (field definitions) of the input parcel fabric lines table must match the schema of the target parcel fabric lines table for data to be appended. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.AppendParcelFabric.field_mapping_lines
member.summary: Lists the attribute fields that will be mapped to the target lines table. The list includes the existing attribute fields of the target lines table and attribute fields that match between the input lines table and the target lines table. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.AppendParcelFabric.lines_subtype
member.summary: A subtype description to assign that subtype to all new line features in a parcel fabric that is appended to the target parcel fabric. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.AppendParcelFabric.control_schema_type
member.summary: Specifies if the schema (field definitions) of the input parcel fabric control table must match the schema of the target parcel fabric control table for data to be appended. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.AppendParcelFabric.field_mapping_control
member.summary: Lists the attribute fields that will be mapped to the target control table. The list includes the existing attribute fields of the target control table and attribute fields that match between the input control table and the target control table. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.AppendParcelFabric.control_subtype
member.summary: A subtype description to assign that subtype to all new control point features in a parcel fabric that is appended to the target parcel fabric. (In, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.AppendParcelFabric.output
member.summary: Output Parcel Fabric (out, Optional)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.AppendParcelFabric.ToolboxDirectory
member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.name: T:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.CopyParcelFabric
member.summary: Copies parcels from the input parcel fabric dataset or layer to a new parcel fabric.

member.name: M:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.CopyParcelFabric.#ctor(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Constructor that takes all required parameters for geoprocessor execution.

param.name: in_parcels
param.summary: The parcels to be copied to another parcel fabric. (In, Required)

param.name: output_parcels
param.summary: The new parcel fabric to which the parcels will be copied. If the parcel fabric exists and you have chosen to overwrite the outputs of geoprocessing operations by setting arcpy.env.overwriteOutput to True, the existing parcel fabric will be overwritten with a new parcel fabric containing the copied parcels. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.CopyParcelFabric.in_parcels
member.summary: The parcels to be copied to another parcel fabric. (In, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.CopyParcelFabric.output_parcels
member.summary: The new parcel fabric to which the parcels will be copied. If the parcel fabric exists and you have chosen to overwrite the outputs of geoprocessing operations by setting arcpy.env.overwriteOutput to True, the existing parcel fabric will be overwritten with a new parcel fabric containing the copied parcels. (Out, Required)

member.name: P:ESRI.ArcGIS.ParcelFabricTools.CopyParcelFabric.config_keyword
member.summary: Specifies the storage parameters (configuration) for parcel fabrics in file and ArcSDE geodatabases. Personal geodatabases do not use configuration keywords. (In, Optional)

member.summary: The directory of this tool's toolbox.

member.summary: The name of this tool's toolbox.

member.summary: The name of this tool.

member.summary: The alias for this tool's toolbox.

member.summary: The parameters used by this tool. For internal use only.
